channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn On Location
channel.desc: From the National Blue Army Shrine, discover more about Our Lady of Fatima?s prophecies, the importance of purposeful suffering, and the significance of First Saturday devotions. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Land Rosary
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch Pacwa leads the Joyful Mysteries of the Rosary from the actual holy sites and shrines where they took place, bringing the Gospels to life and offering a deeper understanding of the Rosary meditations. (19 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Blessed Virgin Mary
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word as they recite this beautiful prayer in honor of the Blessed Virgin Mary from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (11 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reviving The Roman Catholic Church In Eastern Russia
channel.desc: Various parishioners give moving accounts on how the revival of the Catholic Church in Russia has personally impacted their lives. (45 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Into The Breach: The Mission Of The Family
channel.desc: In a world that doesn?t value Christian ideals, how can we raise spiritually strong children? Discover what can instill an authentic desire in our children to deepen their Faith. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholic Social Teaching
channel.desc: Taking as source texts Laborem Exercens, Rerum Novarum and the New Testament, Msgr. Swetland discusses the notion of work as redemptive in union with Christ's work of redemption. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Father Spitzer?s Universe
channel.desc: Fr. Spitzer answers viewer questions on a wide range of subjects, including: Reason, Faith, Suffering, Virtue, and the Existence of God. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Women Of Grace
channel.desc: Today?s guest, Father Peter John Cameron, is a Dominican priest, award-winning playwright, founder and artistic director of a repertory theatre, author of ten books, and the founding editor-in-chief of Magnificat. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Where God Weeps
channel.desc: Jonas Soto highlights the Church?s critical role in supporting Ukrainian war victims through shelter, food, and spiritual care, sharing testimonies of those amidst the devastation. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Stones And Pearls: The Rosary In The Holy Land
channel.desc: The gravity of eternal life accentuates the fifth glorious mystery. Jesus placed his mother next to him as queen of heaven and Earth. She remains at his side in eternal life, which is the crowning glory of our own life. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Chimes
channel.desc: Charles Dickens' story of a poor 19th century porter, who is magically transported to the future from the sounds of chiming bells and his hope is restored. Narrated by Derek Jacobi. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Massterpiece Donut Shop
channel.desc: Join Duncan and The Donut Repair Club is singing along with original songs about the Mass featured on Massterpiece Donut Shoppe. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: Mother talks about the signs of God?s love that are all around us and discusses the ways that He has shown his love for us. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saint Pio Of Pietrelcina Man Of Hope And Healing
channel.desc: Expert commentary and personal reflections from those who knew him well, highlight this docudrama about the life and spirituality of the great miracle worker, St. Padre Pio. (75 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Heartbeat Of My Soul
channel.desc: Learn what it takes to become a priest in this revealing visit to St. Francis de Sales academy. Seminarians and alumnI share their individual stories, their commitment to serving Christ and their hopes for the future. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Fields And Faith
channel.desc: Bob Dolan invites NFL wide receiver Chris Horn to discuss how his Catholic faith played a large role in his career and how his faith remains front-and-center in his life after football. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Rosary With Mother Angelica
channel.desc: Mother Angelica and the Poor Clares of Perpetual Adoration recite the Joyful Mysteries of the Rosary from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Divine Mercy
channel.desc: From the chapel of the National Shrine of the Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Live Adoration From Ewtn Chapel
channel.desc: From Our Lady of the Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Real Life Catholic
channel.desc: Chris meets authentic Mainers while lobstering, tug boating and enjoying the visual and spiritual beauty of the New England coast. Hear moving stories from a Maine cop and get priceless wisdom from a real life hermit. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: At Home With Jim And Joy
channel.desc: Jim and Joy welcome practicing Naturopathic Physician and Psychotherapist, Dr. Anna Nordin, to the show to speak about effective paths to healing after an abortion. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholics Come Home
channel.desc: Paul Darrow shares his journey home to the Church after an abusive upbringing in an atheist home and a self-destructive life as a homosexual successful international fashion model. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn News In Depth
channel.desc: EWTN?s weekly one-hour discussion of current events in the Church, politics, and culture, from a Catholic perspective. Covering the underreported stories and clarifying the Church's position on key teachings, with a focus on the laity's needs and concerns. Hosted by Catherine Hadro. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Rosary In French
channel.desc: The Joyful Mysteries of the Annunciation, Visitation, Nativity, Presentation and Finding and its graces and virtues. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Le Chapelet De La Divine Misericorde
channel.desc: The Chaplet of the Divine Mercy is prayed in French by the parish of Our Lady of the Nativity in La Garde, France. Our Lord taught Sister Faustina in Poland, the five decades to recite. Spoken and sung with portrayals of Jesus' Passion and Resurrection. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reflections With Fr. Leo Clifford
channel.desc: Father Leo Clifford discusses how Our Lady is to be in our lives in 2 ways - as Our Mother and as our model for life. She brought us Jesus and She continues Her work for Him by bringing us to Him. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Signes Miracles Eucharistiques
channel.desc: Ce documentaire pr?sente le travail accompli par le v?n?rable Carlo Acutis sur cinq miracles eucharistiques reconnus par l??glise. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholics Come Home
channel.desc: Hear the inspiring story of a woman who overcame sexual abuse, her family?s secretive cult involvement, and turbulent childhood, to paint Catholic Icons and com home to the Church. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: St. Matthew was a different kind of tax collector ? he was a thief. Mother discusses his life and how Our Lord continues to reach out to poor sinners like him. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saint Margaret Of Castello Seeing Through God?s Eyes
channel.desc: Few have faced the trials of St. Margaret of Castello, including blindness, physical disabilities and abandonment by her parents. But she overcame it all to minister to the sick and dying as a Third Order Dominican. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Where God Weeps
channel.desc: Discover the widespread issue of intra-family violence in Nicaragua and its broader implications across Central America, while uncovering the possible paths to resolution. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Choices We Face
channel.desc: Anthony Feola shares his profound encounter with the Holy Spirit, why Scripture drew him deeper into his Faith, and how we too can personally know the third person of the Trinity. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholic Classics: Mother Angelica Presents
channel.desc: Mother Angelica teaches you how to deal with your favorite enemy: that person or thing which often tempts you to sinful behavior. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Speaking Of Saints
channel.desc: Susan Conroy demonstrates that the Eucharist fills us with every grace and blessing possible if we receive worthily. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Living Right With Dr. Ray
channel.desc: When mom and dad disagree on how to discipline the kids, accepting it is not the answer. Dr. Ray does some role play on common, everyday situations to impart solid advice for life. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saints Vs. Scoundrels
channel.desc: St. Dominic and Beauvoir battle over what it means to be man and woman. But an attempt to burn each other?s books becomes a test of right and wrong, and the Church must follow Christ to the fullest to preach the Gospel. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Savoring Our Faith
channel.desc: Fr. Leo Patalinghug prepares Italian cuisine while discussing the importance of family togetherness and how we can all look to our Mother Church. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Dominican Sisters Of Mary, Mother Of The Eucharist
channel.desc: A continuing conversation about the doctrines and mysteries of our faith with Sr. John Dominic and Sr. Louis Marie. They discuss the best way to teach catechesis to Catholics using the book ?Echoing the Mystery.?. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Land Rosary
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch Pacwa leads the Glorious Mysteries of the Rosary from the actual holy sites and shrines where they took place, bringing the Gospels to life and offering a deeper understanding of the Rosary meditations. (18 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of Saint Joseph
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word as they recite this inspirational litany asking for the prayers of Saint Joseph from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (12 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! My Lourdes Faith Journey
channel.desc: When a convert to Catholicism awakens in the middle of the night to a television program, a pilgrimage to Lourdes ensues where he has a mysterious encounter with the Mother of God. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Life Is Worth Living
channel.desc: Bishop Fulton Sheen looks at the three main components of alcoholism: biological, psychological, and spiritual focusing mainly on the spiritual. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholic Social Teaching
channel.desc: Msgr. Swetland explores the principles of the universal destination of goods, solidarity among workers, and doing what can be done at the local level first. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn News In Depth
channel.desc: EWTN?s weekly one-hour discussion of current events in the Church, politics, and culture, from a Catholic perspective. Covering the underreported stories and clarifying the Church's position on key teachings, with a focus on the laity's needs and concerns. Hosted by Catherine Hadro. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Called To Communion With Dr. David Anders
channel.desc: Dr. Anders answers questions about the source of biblical prophecy, how to know if God is speaking to you rather than self, and the New Jerusalem as a physical place. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reasons To Believe
channel.desc: Renowned Biblical scholar, Dr. Scott Hahn and co-host Mike Aquilina explore the Biblical origins of the Papacy. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Truth In The Heart
channel.desc: Sister Amata Veritas and Sister Mary Jospeh give a Grade 2 lesson on Regina Caeli. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: My Catholic Family
channel.desc: Following St. Monica's perseverance, Sarah and her family pray for Aunt Diane, a famous actress living away from God, and will return to the Catholic faith. Alex continues with his daily training to become a member of his college soccer team. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Great Books Every Catholic Should Know
channel.desc: Four more works from William Shakespeare are on tap, as Joseph Pearce delves into the key moral themes contained in Hamlet, Twelfth Night, Othello and Macbeth. See the beauty of truth found in these classic stories. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Adoration And Reparation
channel.desc: A special presentation of the Chaplet of Adoration and Reparation. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Angelus With Pope Leo Xiv
channel.desc: On the Solemnity of the Most Holy Trinity, Pope Leo XIV recites the Angelus in St Peter?s Square, invoking the Blessed Mother and uniting in prayer with many throughout the world. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn Bookmark
channel.desc: Dr. Paul Kengor discusses the phenomena of the stigmata and their visions, revelations, prophecies and warnings that can often relate to the End Times and Second Coming of Christ. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Spirit Of Catholic Leadership
channel.desc: Fr. Spitzer continues his look at the Eight Principles of Catholic Leadership. In this episode Fr. Spitzer examines the final four principles; the Silver Rule, bringing in the Golden Rule, applying leadership to moments of real problem-solving and suffering, and the triangle of leadership. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Setting Captives Free: A Deeper Look At Ignatian Discernment Of Spirits
channel.desc: Using real life experiences, Fr. Gallagher explains the methodology behind St. Ignatius? teaching on the discernment of spirits, both good and evil, as well as states of consolation and desolation. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Sunday Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate the Holy Sacrifice of the Mass each Sunday from Our Lady of the Angels Chapel as friars intone Gregorian chant. Visiting clergy concelebrate this sacrament. LIVE Sundays at 8 am Eastern. (80 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Sacred Heart Of Jesus
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word at the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama, as they pray the Litany of the Sacred Heart. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Praying As A Family
channel.desc: Busy families share how taking the time to pray together has revolutionized their lives. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Padre Pio Pilgrimage Mass
channel.desc: From Knock, Ireland. (75 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Heartbeat Of My Soul
channel.desc: Learn what it takes to become a priest in this revealing visit to St. Francis de Sales academy. Seminarians and alumnI share their individual stories, their commitment to serving Christ and their hopes for the future. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saint Margaret Of Castello Seeing Through God?s Eyes
channel.desc: Few have faced the trials of St. Margaret of Castello, including blindness, physical disabilities and abandonment by her parents. But she overcame it all to minister to the sick and dying as a Third Order Dominican. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Holy Rosary From Lourdes
channel.desc: Pilgrims from around the world gather and pray the Rosary from the Lourdes grotto in France, site of the famous apparitions by the Blessed Virgin Mary in 1858. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Sunday Mass From Lourdes
channel.desc: (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Le Chapelet De La Divine Misericorde
channel.desc: The Chaplet of the Divine Mercy is prayed in French by the parish of Our Lady of the Nativity in La Garde, France. Our Lord taught Sister Faustina in Poland, the five decades to recite. Spoken and sung with portrayals of Jesus' Passion and Resurrection. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reflections With Fr. Leo Clifford
channel.desc: Father Leo Clifford discusses how each day should be offered as an entire prayer to the Lord. We are not to exclude Him from any portion of our life, but invite Him to enhance our understanding of the love He has for us and to grow in love for Him. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Sunday Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate the Holy Sacrifice of the Mass each Sunday from Our Lady of the Angels Chapel as friars intone Gregorian chant. Visiting clergy concelebrate this sacrament. LIVE Sundays at 8 am Eastern. (80 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Sacred Heart Of Jesus
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word at the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama, as they pray the Litany of the Sacred Heart. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Father Spitzer?s Universe
channel.desc: Fr. Spitzer answers viewer questions on a wide range of subjects, including: Reason, Faith, Suffering, Virtue, and the Existence of God. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Empire Of The Cross
channel.desc: Fr. Allan White, O.P., delivers an onsite exploration of the Basilica of San Clemente from Rome, and explains how its foundation serves as a living example of Catholic tradition. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Great Books Every Catholic Should Know
channel.desc: Four more works from William Shakespeare are on tap, as Joseph Pearce delves into the key moral themes contained in Hamlet, Twelfth Night, Othello and Macbeth. See the beauty of truth found in these classic stories. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn Bookmark
channel.desc: Dr. Paul Kengor discusses the phenomena of the stigmata and their visions, revelations, prophecies and warnings that can often relate to the End Times and Second Coming of Christ. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Vaticano
channel.desc: Meet the Tayeh Family and the Christian community they've built in Lebanon. Visit the school of Saint Carlo Acutis, where his teachers share their memories. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Church And The Poor
channel.desc: Fr. Ho Lung welcomes Donna Scira to discuss how participation of the laity to the Missionaries of the Poor brings profound experiences that deeply affect their lives and others. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: An Ewtn Holy Land Experience
channel.desc: Delve into the mystery of Incarnation as Fr. Joseph and Fr. Mark journey to sites throughout Bethlehem for an unforgettable Christmas experience. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: Reading from Ephesians 4:2, Mother discusses that we should not only be charitable but tolerate those who are different. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Sunday Vespers With Benediction
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word as they celebrate Vespers and Benediction of the Blessed Sacrament from Our Lady of the Angels Chapel in Irondale, Alabama. (35 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Sunday Best With Fr. Groeschel
channel.desc: On the minds of our viewers?Is it a sin to hate Satan, is unity between churches possible, are online prayer requests considered prayer, and how do you show love for someone in a same-sex union without condoning it? (25 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn Pro Life Weekly
channel.desc: As millions mourn Charlie Kirk, we look at his pro-life advocacy across the U.S. Plus, following the money of Planned Parenthood's revenue. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Sunday Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate the Holy Sacrifice of the Mass each Sunday from Our Lady of the Angels Chapel as friars intone Gregorian chant. Visiting clergy concelebrate this sacrament. LIVE Sundays at 8 am Eastern. (80 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Sacred Heart Of Jesus
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word at the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama, as they pray the Litany of the Sacred Heart. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Life On The Rock
channel.desc: Gamer extraordinaire, Jonathan Blevins, aka ?BeardedBlevins? joins Fr. Mark at the SEEK/Focus conference in Salt Lake City to discuss the world of gaming and evangelization. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Icons
channel.desc: The program accompanies a group of pilgrims traveling along Spain?s Camino de Santiago as they learn the significance of The Way of St. James, a route traveled for centuries by those seeking spiritual growth. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholic Social Teaching
channel.desc: Inspired by St. Francis and citing John Paul's 1990 document, "The Ecological Crisis: A Shared Responsibility,"Msgr. Swetland explores bringing all things into unity and harmony in Christ. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn Live
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch and Fr. Sebastian Walshe discuss how St. John the Baptist prepared the way for the Messiah and how we can be a witness to the light amid our own cultural challenges. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Bob And Penny Lord Present
channel.desc: Bob and Penny Lord travel to Spain to uncover the life of St. John of the Cross, who was proclaimed a Doctor of the Church for his mystical writings. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Wild Goose
channel.desc: Though once a place of isolation and defeat, Fr. Dave Pivonka, TOR, reveals how ?the desert? has been forever changed thanks to the Holy Spirit?s intercession. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Marriage: For Better...forever!
channel.desc: Marriage Counsler Greg Popcak explains how everything you do in a marriage is a prayer and offers tips on how to grow together in mutual love of Christ and His Church. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Living Right With Dr. Ray
channel.desc: When mom and dad disagree on how to discipline the kids, accepting it is not the answer. Dr. Ray does some role play on common, everyday situations to impart solid advice for life. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Letter And Spirit
channel.desc: Dr. Scott Hahn and Mike Aquilina explain why the Catholic Church has so many rituals and traditions. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Divine Mercy
channel.desc: From the chapel of the National Shrine of the Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reflections With Fr. Leo Clifford
channel.desc: Fr. Leo Clifford shares that we need to have the supernatural gift of hope to gain our eternal life of love. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Crossing The Goal
channel.desc: Former NFL wide receiver, Danny Abramowicz and team discuss the importance of honor in lives of Catholic men. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Empire Of The Cross
channel.desc: Fr. Allan White, O.P., delivers an onsite exploration of the Basilica of San Clemente from Rome, and explains how its foundation serves as a living example of Catholic tradition. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Children, Behold Your Mother
channel.desc: A Rosary's meditation for Children. In studio with children conversation, meditation, singing and praying. (30 minutes).
